trans-unit.source: Consists of a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> objects to be used with catalogs of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: È costituito da una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> oggetti possano essere utilizzati con i cataloghi dei <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDescriptionCollection class is created by the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in their implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartDescriptionCollection viene creata dai vari <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>controlli nelle rispettive implementazioni del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo contenuto in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>(controllo), un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>viene creato l'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This object maintains basic information about a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, including its ID, its title, its description, and a path to an associated icon.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto mantiene le informazioni di base su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo, inclusi il relativo ID, il titolo, descrizione e un percorso di un'icona associata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object to display a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control's information in the catalog, without having to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control itself.
trans-unit.target: I vari <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>controlli è possono utilizzare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>oggetto per visualizzare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>informazioni del controllo del catalogo, senza dover creare un'istanza del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo stesso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDescriptionCollection class is used internally by the Web Parts control set to maintain a collection of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects used in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartDescriptionCollection viene utilizzata internamente dal controllo Web part impostato per mantenere una raccolta di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>gli oggetti utilizzati in un catalogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDescriptionCollection collection is used only when a page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: L'insieme di WebPartDescriptionCollection viene utilizzato solo quando una pagina è in modalità di visualizzazione catalogo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is being rendered, it loops through the WebPartDescriptionCollection collection, adding the information from each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object to the displayed catalog.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>viene eseguito il rendering di controllo, esegue il ciclo di raccolta WebPartDescriptionCollection, aggiungendo le informazioni di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>oggetto al catalogo visualizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza vuota di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor can be used to create an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo overload del metodo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A>costruttore può essere utilizzato per creare una raccolta vuota.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> object if the content of an imported description file is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>controllo crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>Se il contenuto di un file di descrizione importato è `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"></xref> object by passing in an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"> </xref> oggetto passando un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDescriptionCollection constructor is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method implementations within the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls to create a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato il costruttore WebPartDescriptionCollection il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>implementazioni del metodo all'interno di diversi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>controlli per creare una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> objects that correspond to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> oggetti che corrispondono al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in un catalogo.

trans-unit.source: webPartDescriptions is .
trans-unit.target: webPartDescriptionsis .

trans-unit.source: A member of webPartDescriptions is -or- A member of webPartDescriptions is not an object of type -or- A member of webPartDescriptions has a duplicate property
trans-unit.target: Un membro del webPartDescriptions è - oppure - membro webPartDescriptions non è un oggetto di tipo - oppure - membro webPartDescriptions dispone di una proprietà di duplicati

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un controllo specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to determine whether a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di determinare se un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>oggetto fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: A particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> exists in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> esiste un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>gli oggetti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> oggetti in cui viene copiata insieme.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects, and you need to know the ordinal position of one object relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>oggetti ed è necessario conoscere la posizione ordinale di un oggetto rispetto agli altri.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro della raccolta in base al relativo indice all'interno della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection by index.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore elemento consente di accedere all'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>insieme in base all'indice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro della raccolta in base a un identificatore di stringa univoco.

trans-unit.source: The Item indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore elemento consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>dell'oggetto un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection>insieme in base a un identificatore univoco.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription>

trans-unit.source: The string that serves as a unique identifier for a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: La stringa che funge da identificatore univoco per un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription"> </xref> in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of id.
trans-unit.target: Il primo nella raccolta il cui ID è uguale al valore di id .
